title: Crime  Alert 08.25.20
itunes:title: Crime  Alert 08.25.20
description:
Woman steals more food after refusing to pay for pizza order. Man steals lottery tickets then returns to same store to redeem the winners.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
